title: Creamy Salmon and Broccoli Pie
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '125g butter at room temperature', '50ml cold water', '2 salmon fillets', '1/2 head broccoli, chopped into small pieces, steamed and cooled', '8 small mushrooms, quartered', 'thyme (fresh or dried) to taste', 'dried mixed herbs to taste', 'salt and pepper to taste', '15g butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '300ml milk']
